reviewText: My kids loved this DVD so we got it as a gift for a friend. Im sure he loves it also.

I ordered this as a going away present for a friends daughter. Once they were across the country and unpacking, she text me to tell me the DVD was in French!!! I was going to return it for her, but since they are so far away, she said not to bother plus her daughter was actually watching it - shes 2! Well, if she learns to speak French Ill be happy, but otherwise this was not a good purchase!
